org.youscope.uielements

Class SubConfigurationPanel<C extends Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.youscope.uielements.DynamicPanel
              • org.youscope.uielements.SubConfigurationPanel<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Type of configurations which can be chosen.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SubConfigurationPanel<C extends Configuration>
extends DynamicPanel
    A configuration panel allowing to choose between all configurations of a given type, and then to configure this configuration.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubConfigurationPanel

        public SubConfigurationPanel(java.lang.String choiceString,
                             C lastConfiguration,
                             java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                             YouScopeClient client,
                             YouScopeFrame frame,
                             java.lang.Class<?>... requiredInterface)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        choiceString - If there is one then more choice of configurations the user can select, this string is shown directly above the configuration type chooser. Can be null.
        lastConfiguration - Last configuration which settings should be loaded. Can be null.
        configurationClass - The base class of all configurations which should be choosable.
        client - YouScope client.
        frame - Containing frame.
        requiredInterface - Additional interfaces which are required, e.g. TableProducerConfiguration.class.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        public C getConfiguration()
        Returns the current configuration, or null if no configuration option is present.
        Returns:
        Current configuration.

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(C configuration)
        Sets the current configuration. That means, it tries to change the selected addon UI such that the configuration types match, and then initializes the addon UI with the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration to set.

      • addActionListener

        public void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Adds an action listener which gets notified if the chosen configuration type changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to add.

      • removeActionListener

        public void removeActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Removes a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to remove.
